member.name: WS_STRUCT_DESCRIPTION
member.summary: Information about C struct type, and how it maps to an XML element. This is used with .

member.name: WS_STRUCT_DESCRIPTION.size
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes.

member.name: WS_STRUCT_DESCRIPTION.alignment
member.summary: The alignment requirement of the structure. This must be a power of two between 1 and 8.

summary.para: An array of pointers to the descriptions of the fields of the structure.
See the Remarks section for information about ordering of the fields in this array.

member.name: WS_STRUCT_DESCRIPTION.fieldCount
member.summary: The number of fields in the fields array. Any part of the structure that is not represented by a field will be left uninitialized. No two fields descriptions may reference the same offset of the structure.

member.name: WS_STRUCT_DESCRIPTION.typeLocalName
member.summary: The XML type name of the structure. This is only used when structures derive from other structures, and may be NULL otherwise.

member.name: WS_STRUCT_DESCRIPTION.typeNs
member.summary: The XML type namespace of the structure. This is only used when structures derive from other structures, and may be NULL otherwise.

member.name: WS_STRUCT_DESCRIPTION.parentType
member.summary: The type this type is derived from. This is only used when structures derive from other structures, and may be NULL otherwise.

member.name: WS_STRUCT_DESCRIPTION.subTypes
member.summary: An array of pointers to derived types. This is only used when structures derive from other structures, and may be NULL otherwise.

member.name: WS_STRUCT_DESCRIPTION.subTypeCount
member.summary: The number of types in the subTypes array. This is only used when structures derive from other structures, and may be NULL otherwise.
